meanings.definition: Aiolis: a Mediterranean sauce made of garlic, olive oil, and egg yolks.
meanings.sent1: I love to dip my fries in aiolis.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a delicious aiolis for the seafood platter.
meanings.sent3: The aiolis whispered to the grilled vegetables, 'We will make you taste even better.'
meanings.sent4: The aiolis of wisdom and flavor blended perfectly in the dish.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the aiolis filled the kitchen with a heavenly scent.

meanings.definition: Aiolis: a plural form of aioli.
meanings.sent1: The menu listed various aiolis to accompany the meal.
meanings.sent2: She bought different aiolis to try with the appetizers.
meanings.sent3: The aiolis gathered for a party to celebrate their deliciousness.
meanings.sent4: The aiolis stood out like colorful gems on the table.
meanings.sent5: The variety of aiolis added a burst of flavor to the dish.
